Params: {2: 'Liv', 3: "It's been a while since we last met.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yep, Commandant, were you expecting Lucia instead?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia is not coming today, she said that she will wait at the base for the end of your isolation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'And she said something like "I don\'t want the commandant to get worried."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But I get where she's coming from. After all...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You aren't just some captain or a leader to us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Anyway, I'm relieved to see Commandant looking good. I'll tell Lucia that!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right as Liv leaves, Alpha hijacks into your channel—'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Is this your relationship with the Constructs?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'The Constructs are "artificial weapons" designed to fight against the Punishing Virus after all.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're a Construct too, are you not?", 3: '33'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Yes, so I never want to be anyone's friend.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Weapons should stay weapons. No less. No more.', 4: '1'}
{2: "But you still carry other Constructs' dog tags on you.", 3: '36'}
